text: The 2016 Chengdu Challenger was a professional tennis tournament played on hard courts. It was the 1st edition of the tournament which was part of the 2016 ATP Challenger Tour. It took place in Chengdu, China between 1 and 7 August 2016. ==Singles main draw entrants== ===Seeds=== {|class="sortable wikitable" |- ! width="70"| Country ! width="175"| Player ! Rank1 ! Seed |- | |Konstantin Kravchuk |103 |1 |- | |Go Soeda |127 |2 |- | |Alexander Kudryavtsev |166 |3 |- | |Wu Di |173 |4 |- | |Zhang Ze |181 |5 |- | |Enrique López-Pérez |188 |6 |- | |Lee Duck-hee |194 |7 |- | |Pere Riba |197 |8 |} * 1 Rankings are as of July 25, 2016. ===Other entrants=== The following players received wildcards into the singles main draw: * Te Rigele * Ouyang Bowen * He Yecong * Janko Tipsarević The following player received entry into the singles main draw with a protected ranking: * Karunuday Singh The following players received entry from the qualifying draw: * Sun Fajing * Takuto Niki * Yuya Kibi * Evgeny Karlovskiy ==Champions== ===Singles=== * Jason Jung def. Rubén Ramírez Hidalgo, 6–4, 6–2 ===Doubles=== * Gong Maoxin / Zhang Ze def. Gao Xin / Li Zhe, 6–3, 4–6, [13–11] Chengdu Challenger 2016
title: 2016 Chengdu Challenger
